thinking: My task is to first go to the first trash bin. My first target is the trash bin on the left-hand side. To face it more directly, I need to turn left.
I have turned left. The first trash bin is now more centered in my view, slightly to the left-hand side. I need to move closer to it, so I will move forward.
I have moved closer to the first trash bin. It is now clearly visible in the center-left portion of my view. I need to get right next to it, so I will continue moving forward.
I have moved forward again and am now standing directly in front of the first trash bin. This satisfies the first part of my instruction: 'walk to the first trash bin'.

I have reached the first trash bin. The second part of my instruction is to 'proceed to the ticket machine'. I can see the ticket machines in the distance on the right-hand side. I need to turn right to face them.
I have turned right, but the ticket machines are still on the right-hand side of my view. I need to turn further right to align myself better with them before moving forward.
Now the ticket machines are mostly centered in my view, slightly to the right-hand side. I can start moving towards them. I will move forward.
I have moved forward, and the ticket machines are closer and still centered in my view. I need to continue moving forward to reach them.

I am getting very close to the ticket machines. The left machine is slightly on the left-hand side, and the right machine is more centered. I'll turn slightly right to face the right-hand ticket machine more directly.
After turning right, the right-hand ticket machine is now centered directly in front of me. I need to take one more step forward to reach it.
I have moved forward and am now standing right in front of the ticket machine. This completes the second part of the instruction, 'proceed to the ticket machine'. The task is finished.
